name: Frisbee Game in Unity
description: A 3D frisbee game built using Unity targeting Oculus headsets, including 3D modeling in Trimble SketchUp

name: IoT-based Wildfire Detection System
description: Designed and developed an IoT system for real-time wildfire detection and prevention, deployed on fire towers in remote high-risk areas; integrated AWS S3 image storage, Google Maps geolocation; durable waterproof enclosure

name: AI-powered Drone Swarm
description: Exploring collaborative drone control using generative AI for real-time path planning and obstacle avoidance

name: Uranium Enrichment Calculator
description: Built for Centrus Energy to compute feed quantity, SWU requirements, and optimum tails assay from input assays
